org.anddev.andengine.engine
Class Engine

java.lang.Object
  org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITouchController.ITouchEventCallback, TimeConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoubleSceneSplitScreenEngine, FixedStepEngine, LimitedFPSEngine, SingleSceneSplitScreenEngine
public class Engine
extends Object
implements ITouchController.ITouchEventCallback, TimeConstants

The Engine makes the game proceed in small discrete steps of time. The Engine manages to synchronize a periodic drawing and updating of the Scene, which contains all the content that your game is currently handling actively.
(c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich
(c) 2011 Zynga Inc.

Since:
12:21:31 - 08.03.2010
Author:
Nicolas Gramlich
